content: Why does Zulip decline to recognize @quicksketch? Is there a configuration something we missed?
@docwilmot it's because Zulip uses your name and not your username. I changed mine after I noticed it wasn't working when people pinged my username
and mine was only different by a space!
That's not the username he's set for himself. Its like someone trying to tag you with @Andy.
cant he change his name to quicksketch in zulip settings? looks like its possible there, no?
Yes, just a matter of preference for him.
